actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The spirit statue touches one creature. Once within the next 10 minutes, that creature can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice, immediately after rolling the d20.
actions.name: Counsel of the Past (2/Day)

languages: any languages it knew in life
name: Spirit Statue Mascot

specialTraits.description: When the spirit statue is reduced to 0 hit points, the statue crumbles, and the spirit returns to the afterlife in a burst of ghostly white flame. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) radiant damage.
specialTraits.name: Death Burst
